document_data.name: Archadamius Luciard
document_data.mainbody: '''Archadamius Luciard''' was an [[Elf|elven]] merchant and [[wizard]] from [[Westgate]].
document_data.Description: Archadamius had light skin, blue eyes, and long, gray hair. He wore a blue robe and metallic bracers.
document_data.Possessions: He owned several magical items, including a pair of ''[[bracers of defense]]'', a ''[[ring of protection]]'', and a ''[[staff of power]]''.
document_data.Activities: He ran a small, yet successful shipping company out of Westgate's port. Archadamius had many connections in the city's nobility, which he used both for financial and political gain. His successful business allowed Archadamius to finance his magical training.
